description: Masks are compulsory and visitor numbers are restricted at the world's most-visited museum.
title: Coronavirus: Louvre reopens with masks and one-way system
title_page: Coronavirus: Louvre reopens with masks and one-way system - BBC News
maintext: "We are losing 80% of our public," director Jean-Luc Martinez told AFP news agency. "We are going to be at best 20-30% down on last summer - between 4,000 and 10,000 visitors a day."
